name: .ORGAN
summary: Learn about .ORGAN files and view a list of programs that open them.
developer: Lars Palo, Oleg Samarin and Denis Roussel

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open ORGAN files with GrandOrgue in Windows, macOS, and Linux. To open an ORGAN file with GrandOrgue, select File → Open. You can also select, File → Load or File → Install organ package.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .organ file in GrandOrgue 1
images.caption: ORGAN file open in GrandOrgue 1
